title: Fix gosec linting issues in test files
description:
The gosec security linter was disabled due to issues with test files. Need to properly address the security warnings:

- G304: Potential file inclusion via variable (os.ReadFile in tests)
- G301: Directory permissions should be 0750 or less (os.MkdirAll with 0755)
- G306: File permissions should be 0600 or less (os.WriteFile with 0644)

These are legitimate security concerns that should be addressed rather than disabling the linter.

title: create config init command
design:
Implement a new config sub-command init

This should:
- follow existing sub-command patterns
- setup a default config in either the default user location or system location pointing to quad-ops examples in the repository
  ```yaml
  repositories:
  - name: quad-ops-compose  # Repository name (required)
    url: "https://github.com/example/repo.git"  # Git repository URL (required)
    ref: "main"  # Git reference to checkout: branch, tag, or commit hash (optional)
    composeDir: "compose"  # Subdirectory where Docker Compose files are located (optional)
  ```
acceptance_criteria: Command successfully creates an example config, has passing tests, and builds successfully

title: artifact_helpers.go - launchd.Options has no field or method LabelPrefix
